title: Pedagogical Design for Software Design Patterns Using Intelligent Tutoring Systems in Large-Scale Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Programming Knowledge and Understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) Concepts
context.additional_context: Practical teaching methodology training program for pre-service/in-service teachers. Offline collaborative learning environment setup using digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze application scenarios of 10 core design patterns with 80% accuracy
Learners can identify and correct at least three of their own error patterns based on system feedback
Learners can present and improve design pattern application cases at least twice through peer evaluation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
